name: Sneakeasy
description:
Sneakeasy is a 2D side-scrolling Stealth Platformer, where the player uses parkour-style movement and electromagnetic grenades to travel through a retro-future-inspired city and steal a diamond from a ruthless tycoon.

Do you have what it takes to get past ruthless robot enemies by running, vaulting, jumping, and wall-kicking your way to riches?!?
